data.title: Manipulation of sentences
data.statement:
<<Statement>>:
Reverse and shift! Dive into the complexity of string manipulations.

In this challenge, you're presented with a sentence. Your task is to reverse each word of the sentence and shift each letter of the word two positions forward in the alphabet. And remember, if the word was in uppercase, ensure the transformed word remains in uppercase.

<<Note>>:
The alphabet is circular. This means after 'z', we cycle back to 'a', and after 'Z', it's back to 'A'.

Goal

Statement:
Reverse and shift! Dive into the complexity of string manipulations.

In this challenge, you're presented with a sentence. Your task is to reverse each word of the sentence and shift each letter of the word two positions forward in the alphabet. And remember, if the word was in uppercase, ensure the transformed word remains in uppercase.

Note:

Input
